name: 'One' Movies Quiz | Something in the Title | 10 Questions

questions.text: What 1985 movie starred Tom Hanks as an innocent man being tracked down by spy hunters?
questions.correct: The Man With One Red Shoe
questions.explanation:
The Man With One Red Shoe.

	This early Tom Hanks movie was adapted from the French movie "The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe".

questions.text: What 1978 movie, directed by Carl Reiner, saw Henry Winkler as a wrestler?
questions.explanation:
The One and Only.

	This comedy co-starred Dabney Coleman, Polly Holiday and Herve Villechaize.

questions.text: What 1977 movie saw Robbie Benson as a basketball star?
questions.explanation:
One on One.

	Robbie Benson co-wrote the screenplay with his father Jerry Segal.

questions.text: What 1961 movie saw Marlon Brando pitted against Karl Malden?
questions.explanation:
One-Eyed Jacks.

	After the original director (Stanley Kubrick) stepped down, Marlon Brando took over as director.  After the movie was done (in six months), there was over 4 hours of footage.  Luckily, the movie was cut down to 2 hours and 20 minutes.

questions.text: What 1991 movie saw Michael Keaton as a good cop gone bad?
questions.explanation:
One Good Cop.

	Michael Keaton played was Artie Lewis, a very ethical cop, until he becomes desperate and decides to rob someone.  Rene Russo co-starred as his wife.

questions.text: What 1988 movie saw one of the co-stars of the movie "ET" as a murderer?
questions.explanation:
Murder One.

	Henry Thomas, who starred as Elliot in "ET", played in this true-crime movie as Billy Isaacs.  In the movie, Billy and his brothers go on a 12 day crime spree of robbery and murder.

questions.text: What 1997 movie saw the main character Max Carlyle regretting what he did just one time?
questions.explanation:
One Night Stand.

	Wesley Snipes played Max Carlyle, a happily married man, until he decides to have a one stand stand with a woman he just met (Nastassja Kinski).  After a year of lamenting for his mistake, he meets up again with Kinski, who is married to Max's best friend's brother.

questions.text: In what movie would you find such characters as Tumak and Loana?
questions.explanation:
One Million Years B.C.

	Raquel Welch starred as Loana in this 1967 movie that had advertising such as "See Raquel Welch In Mankind's First Bikini!"

questions.text: What 1975 movie, directed by Milos Forman, won Academy Awards for the three top categories (Best Actor, Best Actress & Best Picture)?
questions.correct: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
questions.explanation:
One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest.

	Jack Nicholson and Louise Fletcher both won the Academy Award for Best Actor and Best Actress. This wonderfully funny and sad movie also won the Academy Award for Picture as well as an Academy Award for Director Milos Forman.

questions.text: This 1934 movie starred Clark Gable and Claudette Colbert as two mismatched people who fall in love with each other?
questions.explanation:
It Happened One Night.

	I don't usually recommend seeing movies, but this movie is one of the funniest movies made.  It won the Academy Award for Best Picture, Best Actor, Best Actress and Best Director (Frank Capra).  If you would like to watch a very funny movie that will have you laughing so hard you'll be crying, watch this movie.
